name: Rogue Empire: Dungeon Crawler RPG
description: Rogue Empire is a tactical turn-based RPG with randomly generated content and heavy Rogue-like elements. Choose one of multiple character combinations and advance it with unique abilities! Embark on a quest to heal the 5 kingdoms and understand the mysteries of the First Shadow!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 处理器: 2 GHz 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: 800x600 minimum resolution 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
